dcterms:description: ActivityNet Captions contains 20,000 untrimmed videos and 100,000 descriptions from YouTube, covering a wide range of complex human behavior.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet Captions

dcterms:description: TACoS contains 127 videos from cooking scenarios, with an average of around 7 minutes, focusing on grounding action descriptions in videos.

dcterms:description: ActivityNet-CG is a new split of ActivityNet Captions aimed at evaluating compositional generalizability with novel compositions or novel words.
